summary.span: 提供一种查看流内容的控件，该控件内置了对多种查看模式的支持。

span.span: Provides a control for viewing flow content, with built-in support for multiple viewing modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括允许用户在各种查看模式之间进行动态选择的功能，包括单页（一次一页）查看模式、一次一页（书籍阅读格式）查看模式和连续滚动（无限）查看模式。 includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes, including a single-page (page-at-a-time) viewing mode, a two-page-at-a-time (book reading format) viewing mode, and a continuous scrolling (bottomless) viewing mode. 如果不需要在不同查看模式之间动态切换的功能，则可以使用特定查看模式中固定的轻型流内容查看器。If you do not need the ability to dynamically switch between different viewing modes, there are lighter-weight flow content viewers that are fixed in a particular viewing mode. 在单页查看模式下显示流内容， 以连续滚动模式显示流内容。 displays flow content in single-page viewing mode, and displays flow content in continuous-scrolling mode. 有关可用显示模式的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about available display modes, see . 下图显示了默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 控件。The following figure shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![具有标注的屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-main.png "包含标注的屏幕截图：FlowDocumentReader")![Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-main.png "Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader") - **内容区域**-内容区域显示由 属性指定的 的内容。**Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the specified by the property. - **工具栏-默认**工具栏停靠在内容区域的下方。**Tool Bar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area. 它承载用于搜索内容、导航页面、选择查看模式和更改缩放级别的控件。It hosts controls for searching content, navigating pages, selecting a viewing mode, and changing the zoom level. - "**查找" 按钮**-"**查找**" 按钮显示 "查找" 对话框，该对话框使用户能够搜索指定字词或短语的 内容。**Find Button** - The **Find** button brings up a Find dialog, which enables the user to search the contents of the for specified terms or phrases. 如果 `false`，则不会显示 "**查找**" 按钮。The **Find** button is not shown if is `false`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . - **页面导航控件**-页面导航控件包含一个按钮，用于跳转到下一页（向下箭头）或上一页（向上箭头），以及当前页码和总页数的指示器。**Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages. - **查看模式按钮**-使用查看模式按钮，用户可以从可用的查看模式中进行选择。**Viewing Mode Buttons** - The viewing mode buttons enable the user to select from available viewing modes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . - **缩放控件**-通过单击加号或减号按钮，用户可以使用缩放控件来增加或减少缩放级别。**Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively. 缩放控件还包括一个用于调整缩放级别的滑块。The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 默认工具栏 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 不包含 "**打印**" 按钮。The default toolbar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] does not include a **Print** button. 是 唯一允许的子元素。 is the only allowable child element for a . 元素最多只能托管一个 。A element can host no more than one . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了上图中所示的 。The following example defines the pictured in the preceding figure. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FloaterFigureXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_floaterfigurexaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Find() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Toggles the Find dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 包含用于切换 "查找" 对话框的 "**查找**" 按钮。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a **Find** button that toggles the Find dialog. 下图显示了具有默认 UI 的 上的 "查找" 对话框。The following figure shows the Find dialog on a with default UI. ![具有标注的屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-find.png "包含标注的屏幕截图：FlowDocumentReader")![Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-find.png "Screenshot with callouts: FlowDocumentReader") 默认的 "查找" 对话框包括用于输入搜索文本的字段，以及 "**查找下一个**"、"**查找上一个**" 和 "**选项**" 按钮。The default Find dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 默认情况下提供下列查找选项：The following Find options are provided by default: - 全字匹配。Match whole word only. - 匹配大小写。Match case. - 匹配音调符号。Match diacritic. - 匹配 kashida。Match kashida. - 匹配 alef hamza。Match alef hamza. 如果 `false` 属性，则调用此方法不起作用。Calling this method has no effect if the property is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将焦点移动到 的内容区域。This method moves the focus to the content area of the . 每当 的依赖属性发生更改时，就会调用此方法。This method is called whenever the dependency property changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 提供与事件有关的数据。

span.span: Provides data about the event.

summary.span: 每当未处理的 附加路由事件在其路由中发生在一个从此类派生的元素上时，就会调用此方法。

span.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled attached routed event reaches an element derived from this class in its route.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 击键由专用的输入管理器处理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 依赖击键（如输入和命令绑定）的其他编程功能可能会在将其作为一般击键公开之前处理击键。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes such as input and command bindings will potentially handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果这些输入系统功能将事件标记为已处理，则将不会调用 。If these input system features mark the event handled, then will not be invoked. 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类实现了此方法，则仍建议在实现中调用 base （）。Calling base() in your implementation is still recommended, in case an intermediate class in the inheritance implemented this method. 您可以根据自己的要求，在特殊处理之前或之后调用 base （）。You may call base() either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 此方法的目的有些类似于 \* 方法上 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 事件模式：它提供了用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下，匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件，On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的，因为路由事件可能是由子元素（而不是将调用处理程序的元素）引发的，因此，您的实现需要将事件参数的源属性考虑（并且在大多数情况下不应尝试重新引发事件）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 当沿路由收到事件时， 的子类可以选择调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种可能的情况是，获取事件的参数并将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and mark the event as handled.

public: property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取由 承载的内容的当前显示页的数目。

span.span: Gets the current number of display pages for the content hosted by the .

value.span: 由 承载的内容的当前显示页的数目。

span.span: The current number of display pages for the content hosted by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流内容不具有固定数目的页的固有概念; 的内容将动态地组织到一组显示页中，其中的数目基于当前的显示和布局特征。Flow content does not have any inherent notion of a fixed number of pages; the contents of a are dynamically organized into a set of display pages, the number of which is based on current display and layout characteristics. 例如，调整 大小或更改 级别会影响内容组织到的显示页的数目。For example, resizing a or changing the level affects the number of display pages that the content is organized into. 当 处于 查看模式时，页计数和当前页码始终为1（假设已加载任何内容）。When the is in the viewing mode, the page count and the current page number are always 1 (assuming any content has been loaded). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 调用标准的“打印”对话框，此对话框可用于打印 的内容和配置打印首选项。

span.span: Invokes a standard Print dialog which can be used to print the contents of the and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 不提供 "**打印**" 按钮。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button. 下图显示了标准打印对话框的示例。The following figure shows an example of a standard Print dialog. 请注意，"打印" 对话框的特定外观可能因宿主计算机的配置而异。Note that the specific appearance of the Print dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![屏幕快照： "打印" 对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕截图：“打印”对话框")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box") 如果 `false` 属性，则调用此方法不起作用。Calling this method has no effect if the property is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand SwitchViewingModeCommand
Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewingModeCommand As RoutedUICommand

summary.span: 获取表示“切换查看模式”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the **Switch Viewing Mode** command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有此命令的内置处理（以及用于许多应用程序和导航命令的内置处理）。The class has built-in handling for this command (as well as built-in handling for a number of application and navigation commands). 有关命令和命令绑定的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commanding and command binding, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview). 您可以改为调用相关 上的 ，而不是启动此命令。Rather than initiate this command, you can instead call on the relevant . 结果是相同的。The result is the same. **切换查看模式**命令可以是无参数的，在这种情况下，查看模式将前进到 枚举序列中的下一个可用查看模式，或者可以通过在 命令参数中命名 来指定查看模式。The **Switch Viewing Mode** command can either be parameterless, in which case the viewing mode advances to the next available viewing mode in the enumeration sequence, or it can specify a viewing mode by naming the in the command parameters. 如果用于在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中设置命令属性，则该命令必须是无参数的。If used to set a command property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the command must be parameterless. 你还可以在派生类中使用或响应此命令，方法是使用内置处理或将其替换为自己的处理。You could also use or respond to this command in a derived class, using either the built-in handling or replacing it with handling of your own. 是可用于更改类处理的回调，无需更改模板或实例中的命令绑定。 is a callback that you can use to change the class handling, without requiring changes to command bindings in the template or in instances. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage ``` ```

span.span: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode ViewingMode { System::Windows::Controls::FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的查看模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the viewing mode for the .

value.span: 值之一，用于指定查看模式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the viewing mode.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 包含用于选择查看模式的按钮。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes buttons for selecting the viewing mode. 下图显示了具有默认 UI 的 上的查看模式选择按钮。The following figure shows the viewing mode selection buttons on a with default UI. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocumentReader ViewMode](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-viewmode.png "屏幕截图：FlowDocumentReader ViewMode")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-viewmode.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode") 有关 查看模式的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about viewing modes, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Zoom { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Zoom : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前缩放级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

value.span: 当前缩放级别，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 100.0（缩放级别为 100%）。

span.span: The default value 100.0 (zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 包含一个缩放控件，该控件提供增加或减少缩放的按钮，以及用于调整缩放级别的滑块。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a zoom control that provides buttons for increasing or decreasing the zoom, as well as a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 下图显示了具有默认 UI 的 上的缩放控件。The following figure shows the zoom controls on a with default UI. ![FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放")![FlowDocumentReader content zoom](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader content zoom") 缩放级别受 和 属性的值的约束。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReaderXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentreaderxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentreader)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentreader)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ZoomIncrement { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ZoomIncrement : double with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 当前缩放增量，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值是 10.0（缩放增量为 10%）。

span.span: The default is 10.0 (zoom increment of 10%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放增量是指在执行 或 命令时增加或减少 级别的百分比。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. 默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 包含一个缩放控件，该控件提供增加或减少缩放的按钮，以及用于调整缩放级别的滑块。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a zoom control that provides buttons for increasing or decreasing the zoom, as well as a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 下图显示了具有默认 UI 的 上的缩放控件。The following figure shows the zoom controls on a with default UI. ![FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader 内容缩放")![FlowDocumentReader content zoom](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-zoom.png "FlowDocumentReader content zoom") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReaderXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentreaderxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentreader)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentReader](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentreader)]
